description: Provide real-time access to EVE Online market data including prices, orders, history, and statistics. Enable detailed market analysis and structure-specific order retrieval with support for authentication and pagination. Simplify integration with EVE Online's ESI API for dynamic market insights.

capabilities.name: get-market-prices
capabilities.description: Get market prices for all items in EVE Online

capabilities.name: get-market-orders
capabilities.description: Get market orders from a specific region

capabilities.name: get-market-history
capabilities.description: Get market history for a specific item in a region

capabilities.name: get-market-groups
capabilities.description: Get grouped market data for a region and type

capabilities.name: get-structure-orders
capabilities.description: Get all market orders in a structure

capabilities.name: get-market-stats
capabilities.description: Get market statistics for a region

capabilities.name: get-structure-type-orders
capabilities.description: Get all market orders for a specific type in a structure

capabilities.name: get-auth-url
capabilities.description: Get the authentication URL for EVE Online SSO

capabilities.name: authenticate
capabilities.description: Exchange authorization code for access token
